description: This is a simple dashboard for: https://github.com/banzaicloud/logging-operator utilising Fluent-bit and Fluentd

targets.expr:
(
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="logging", persistentvolumeclaim=~".*$fluentd.*"})))
  -
  sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="logging", persistentvolumeclaim=~".*$fluentd.*"})))
)
sum without(instance, node) (topk(1, (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace="logging", persistentvolumeclaim=~".*$fluentd.*"})))

title: Logging Dashboard
